content:
Jake walked past the store and continued on his way home. He didn't want to rush into anything without thinking it through more. He knew that smoking was a dangerous habit and that it could be hard to quit once he started. He decided to talk to his parents about his thoughts and feelings.

He sat down with his parents and explained that he had been thinking about smoking and wanted to know more about it. His parents were surprised but listened carefully. They explained the dangers of smoking and how it could harm not only his health but also the health of those around him. They also talked to him about the addiction that comes with smoking and how hard it is to quit once you start.

Feeling more informed, Jake made a decision not to smoke. He realized that there were many other things he could do to relax and feel grown-up that didn't involve smoking. He felt proud of himself for making a responsible decision and stuck to it.

The end.
